Abilities: Str 27, Dex 13, Con 19, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 6

Descripci\u00f3n: These long, lean carnivores are slightly taller than brown bears.

Combate: Polar bears fight just as brown bears do.Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a polar bear must hit with a claw attack. It can then attempt to start a grapple as a free action without provoking an attack of opportunity.Skills: A polar bear has a +8 racial bonus on any Swim check to perform some special action or avoid a hazard. It can always choose to take 10 on a Swim check, even if distracted or endangered.
